title: 计分版——三个数的运算
txt_content:
现有A  B  C  三计分版
如何达到A的分数乘B到C的分数
(B的分数在计算中不能改变。。)

replies.author: jimmy1234
replies.txt_content:
那么,照楼主说的做
生成积分板
scoreboard objectives add A dummy
scoreboard objectives add B dummy
scoreboard objectives add C dummy

然后，比如B的分数是4
scoreboard players set @s B 4

A的分数是2
scoreboard players set @s A 2

A*B,计算结果记录在A上,B不改变，也就是说,=8
scoreboard players operation @s A = @s B

然后将C的分数=A的分数
scoreboard players operation @s C = @s A

我说的答案是不是不够详细，实际上不仅不用改变B的分数
A和B的分数都不需要变
首先确保你在记分板A和B里都有分数
然后在聊天框里输入下面这俩命令
scoreboard players operation @p C = @p A
scoreboard players operation @p C *= @p B
即可

造成伤害,20%转换为血

但是计算还是可以的
我还是用我的方法(看不懂你的)

scoreboard objectives add B dummy
scoreboard objectives add C dummy
scoreboard objectives add D dummy

造成的伤害要先除以2
所以,将B设置为2
scoreboard players set @s B 2

然后伤害除以2
scoreboard players operation @s A /= @s B

然后再除以10
scoreboard players set @s D 10
scoreboard players operation @s A /= @s D

最后转到C上
scoreboard players operation @s A = @s C

C就是应该回复的血量
